channel.title: Delta source Help
channel.description: hello guys right now im using a source off of pkjadscape and its a delta but i wanted to know if anybody could full help me make an admin zone i have the place i need to know how to change it in the source and to make a command for my admins.. only reply if you know how to thank you!

item.title: Delta source Help
item.dc:creator: @ii_bandos_ii ii bandos ii
item.description:
@ii_bandos_ii wrote:

Go into Client.java and search up

You should see something like this:

if(command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights > 0){ sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); } if(command.startsWith("hail") && playerRights > 2){ hail(); } if(command.startsWith("suckit") && playerRights >= 3){ suck(); } if(command.startsWith("pnpc") && playerRights >= 2){ int npc = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); if(npc < 2745){ npcId = npc; npcId2 = npc; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } if(command.startsWith("unpc") && playerRights >= 2){ isNpc = false; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if(command.startsWith("combat") && playerRights > 2){ int combat = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)); extraCb += combat; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Under the } add this…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("staffzone") && playerRights >= 2) { triggerTele(2510, 4718, 0); sM("You Teleport to the staff zone."); }

Then just save Document and compile and re run source and then you have it.

Read full topic
